targets.rawSql: SELECT city_name FROM weathers
SELECT * FROM air_quality
SELECT temperature, dt FROM forecasts WHERE dt >= date_trunc('day', now()) and dt < date_trunc('day', now()) + interval '7 day' and dt > now() ORDER BY weather_id DESC LIMIT 40
SELECT weather_main AS "Weather", dt AS "Date" FROM forecasts ORDER BY weather_id DESC, id ASC LIMIT 40

options.outputFormat: ddd DD MMM yyyy, hh:mm A

targets.rawSql: SELECT humidity, dt FROM forecasts WHERE dt >= date_trunc('day', now()) and dt < date_trunc('day', now()) + interval '7 day' and dt > now() ORDER BY weather_id DESC LIMIT 40
SELECT feels_like FROM weathers
SELECT weather_description FROM weathers ORDER BY dt DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sunrise AS "Sunrise" FROM weathers
SELECT temperature FROM weathers ORDER BY dt DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT temp_min AS "Temp Min" FROM weathers ORDER BY dt DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT wind_speed AS "Wind Speed" FROM weathers ORDER BY dt DESC LIMIT 1
select humidity AS "Humidity" FROM weathers ORDER BY dt DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT pressure AS "Pressure" FROM weathers ORDER BY dt DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sunset AS "Sunset" FROM weathers
SELECT temp_max AS "Temp Max" FROM weathers ORDER BY dt DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT so2 FROM air_quality
SELECT no2 FROM air_quality
SELECT pm10 FROM air_quality
SELECT aqi AS "Air Quality" FROM air_quality
SELECT pm2_5 FROM air_quality
SELECT o3 FROM air_quality
SELECT co FROM air_quality
